segments.text: I’m taken aback by how quickly the water is rising; it’s almost mesmerizing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman seems utterly lost to the world, and I can’t decide if it’s peaceful or foolish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The chaos of the situation makes my heart race; I just can’t shake the feeling that something bad is about to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Seeing the boy climb that unstable stool makes me want to shout a warning, but I know I can't.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but smile at how innocent they look, all in their little world of cookie theft.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s excitement is palpable; I can almost feel her anticipation for that cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about how this scene captures the essence of childhood, forging ahead without a care.
segments.speaker: PAR
